div.p: After school will be cancelled 12/14 due to the concert. There will be no 5pm bus.

img.alt: Reminder regarding E-alerts (only by emails) from Lisbon Central School

a.span: Reminder regarding E-alerts (only by emails) from Lisbon Central School

div.p: Please log into the school website and check your account. If you have changed your phone numbers or email addresses please log into the school website and change your information so that you continue to receive e-alerts when they are sent out.

a.title: Go to comments for Reminder regarding E-alerts (only by emails) from Lisbon Central School

div.p: receive emails about school cancellations or delays

div.p: Celebrate your child’s birthday in a special way this year. With a donation of one of the following amounts your son/daughter will receive a special treat on their birthday.

div.script: var photoGallery1419= {"Album": {"title":"Photo Gallery 480 x 260","description":"","transitiondelay":"6","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"480","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/NY05000131/Centricity/ModuleInstance/1524/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/NY05000131/Centricity/ModuleInstance/1524/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/NY05000131/Centricity/ModuleInstance/1524/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"lisbon_resized","src":"lisbon_resized.png?rnd=0.0953853652325391","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}

span.span: The mission of the Lisbon Central School is to
be a resource for ensuring the academic, cultural,
and social development of community members.

div.span: Our school provides an environment which is
secure, stimulating, and nurturing. The curriculum
provides the prerequisite skills for a successful personal and professional
career, delivered by a staff committed to caring and excellence. Our result is
productive members of society who are able to maximize their potential in an

hr.div: Lisbon Receives US News & World Report Best High School Award

div.span: Lisbon Central High School has been named one of the best schools in the United States and New York State by US News and World Report! Lisbon is recognized in the National Rankings and earned a bronze medal. Schools are ranked based on their performance on state-required tests and how well they prepare students for college.

li.strong: View the UPK- 4 Supply Lists here.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: Purchase a Piece of Paver History Today! Lisbon Central School: Paving the way with gratitude, support, and memories for the Golden Knights of yesterday, today, and tomorrow.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: Join in supporting our students, faculty, staff, and school community by sharing the names of family, friends, loved ones, or business and organizations engraved on a 6” x 9” inch paving stone that will be laid within the newly erected concession stand seating area.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px 0px; display: inline; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: Visit this link for more details and to download the order form.

p.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-size: 12px; background-color: #ffffff; text-align: center;

div.p: There are no upcoming events to display.
